articles.title: Analysis: Biden has a better shot at riding the economy up now than Obama did
articles.description: Like Barack Obama twelve years ago, Joe Biden will inherit an economic mess from an outgoing Republican president.

articles.title: 'A lot of firsts on this flight': NASA and SpaceX shoot for history
articles.description: NASA and SpaceX have teamed up to send a diverse group of four astronauts to the International Space Station. CNN's Rachel Crane reports.

articles.author: Analysis by Harry Enten, CNN
articles.title: Why the coronavirus numbers are likely to keep getting worse
articles.description: Poll of the week: A new Gallup poll finds that just 49% of Americans say they would shelter in place if public health officials recommended it because of a coronavirus outbreak.

articles.title: Lewis Hamilton equals Michael Schumacher's record of seven world titles

articles.author: Reuters and Eoin McSweeney, CNN
articles.title: Forces from Ethiopia's Tigray region bombed Eritrean capital, Tigray leader says
articles.description: Rebellious forces from Ethiopia's Tigray region fired rockets at the airport in Eritrea's capital Asmara on Saturday evening, their leader said on Sunday, confirming earlier reports of a major escalation in a 12-day old conflict in Ethiopia.

articles.author: Ashley Strickland and Megan Marples, CNN
articles.title: Leonid meteor shower will shoot fireballs across the sky this week
articles.description: Fireballs and smaller meteors will streak across the sky on November 16 and 17. That's when the Leonid meteor shower peaks.

articles.author: Madeline Holcombe, CNN
articles.title: New York City's Rockefeller Center gets its Christmas tree
articles.description: Even in a year where the global pandemic has drastically disrupted everything from grocery shopping to weddings, some traditions stay the same -- like a Christmas tree in Rockefeller Center.
